channel.title: PPL on FinanClub

item.title: 1077 PPL
item.description: score:1077 Chances: PPL Corporation reported second-quarter 2023 earnings, indicating ongoing capital investments and operation cost savings. PPL has been recognized for cultivating a collaborative, inclusive, and equitable culture, ranking No. 4 on DiversityInc’s Top Utilities list. PPL Electric Utilities is enhancing the reliability of its power delivery to customers through innovative technology, Dynamic Line Rating (DLR).
